page.title: 10Entertainment
page.content: We do not have the chance to see many live plays in Rothbury. However, when the Northumberland Theatre Company is touring the county, there is always a performance in the village. This generally happens two or three times a year. The third and fourth yer children in our school also take part in play productions which are performed in the school hall for parents. We have had two plays this year. First there was the "Spindlestone Dragon" which was very successful, then we had "The Root of Evil" which is a medieval play. "The Root of Evil" was also performed one Sunday morning outside Brinkburn Priory. As it was a sunny day, we were able to have our picnic lunch on the grass after the performance.
